WorkItem.Description:
I would like to see the RequireJS optimizer included in chirpy.

It seems like it can be done in the same way as the GoogleClosureOfflineCompiler. (requiring NodeJs.exe and r.js  https://github.com/jrburke/r.js)

Would this be feasible?
WorkItem.Summary: Add RequireJS Optimizer to JS minifier

Comments.Message: I think this would be a great addition.  I have been on two projects now, where we would like to use RequireJS.
